mapper.insert: insert into working_atti (WORK_DAY, WORK_IN, EMP_ID) values(curdate(), DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%H:%i:%s'), #{emp_id})
mapper.select: select count(WORK_RID) from working_atti where (work_day > LAST_DAY(NOW() - interval 1 month) AND work_day <= LAST_DAY(NOW())) and emp_id = #{emp_id} and work_in is not null

select count(*) from working_atti where( work_day > LAST_DAY(NOW() - interval 1 month) AND work_day <= LAST_DAY(NOW()) ) and emp_id= #{emp_id} and work_in is not null and WORK_IN between '09:00:00' and '18:00:00'
select count(holi_code) from working_atti where emp_id= #{emp_id} and holi_code is not null and ( work_day > LAST_DAY(NOW() - interval 1 month) AND work_day <= LAST_DAY(NOW()) )

select IF(sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, WORK_IN, WORK_OUT)), sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, WORK_IN, WORK_OUT)), '0') as workingTime from working_atti where emp_id = #{emp_id} and ( work_day > LAST_DAY(NOW() - interval 1 month) AND work_day <= LAST_DAY(NOW()) )
select count(*) from working_atti where DATE_FORMAT(work_day,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y') and emp_id = #{emp_id} and work_in is not null
select count(*) from working_atti where DATE_FORMAT(work_day,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y') and emp_id = #{emp_id} and work_in is not null and WORK_IN between '09:00:00' and '18:00:00'
select count(holi_code) from working_atti where emp_id= #{emp_id} and holi_code is not null and DATE_FORMAT(WORK_DAY,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y')

select IF(sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, WORK_IN, WORK_OUT)), sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, WORK_IN, WORK_OUT)), '0') as workingTime from working_atti where DATE_FORMAT(WORK_DAY,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y') and emp_id = #{emp_id}

select e.emp_id, emp_dept, emp_name, w.workDay, l.lateDay, h.holiday, t.workingTime from employee e left outer join (select emp_id, count(work_rid) as workDay from working_atti where work_in is not null group by emp_id) as w on e.emp_id = w.emp_id left outer join (select emp_id, count(*) as lateDay from working_atti where work_in is not null and WORK_IN between '09:00:00' and '18:00:00' group by emp_id) as l on e.emp_id=l.emp_id left outer join (select emp_id, count(holi_code) as holiday from working_atti where holi_code is not null group by emp_id) as h on e.emp_id = h.emp_id left outer join (select emp_id, IF(sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, WORK_IN, WORK_OUT)), sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, WORK_IN, WORK_OUT)), '0') as workingTime from working_atti group by emp_id) as t on e.emp_id = t.emp_id

select count(work_rid) as wkDay_work from working_atti where emp_id = #{emp_id} and work_in is not null and DAYOFWEEK(work_day) !=7 and DAYOFWEEK(work_day) !=1 and ( work_day > LAST_DAY(NOW() - interval 1 month) AND work_day <= LAST_DAY(NOW()) )

select count(work_rid) as wkDay_work from working_atti where emp_id = #{emp_id} and work_in is not null and DAYOFWEEK(work_day) !=7 and DAYOFWEEK(work_day) !=1 and DATE_FORMAT(work_day,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y')
